_note: These settings can be customized by the user for their specific analysis needs

paths.default_model_path_description: Path to the LUPE A-SOiD model file (.pkl)
paths.default_data_input_path_description: Default directory for input data (DLC files)

output_preferences.save_csv_description: Save analysis results as CSV files
output_preferences.plot_format_description: Format for saved plots (svg, png, pdf)
output_preferences.plot_dpi_description: Resolution for saved plots (dots per inch)
output_preferences.create_subdirectories_description: Create separate subdirectories for each analysis type

dlc_preprocessing.likelihood_threshold_description: Minimum likelihood threshold for DLC pose filtering (0.0-1.0)
dlc_preprocessing.skip_rows_description: Number of extra rows to skip when loading DLC files
dlc_preprocessing.save_preprocessed_description: Save preprocessed pose data for future use
dlc_preprocessing.interpolation_method_description: Method for interpolating filtered poses (linear, cubic, nearest)

analysis_defaults.time_bin_minutes_description: Default time bin size in minutes for timeline analysis
analysis_defaults.minimum_bout_duration_description: Minimum duration (seconds) for a behavior bout to be counted

gui_preferences.show_tooltips_description: Display helpful tooltips in the GUI

advanced.parallel_processing_description: Enable parallel processing for multiple files (experimental)
advanced.cache_features_description: Cache extracted features to speed up repeated analysis
